plot: When 15 year-old Talia challenges the assistance envelope given to her by her school, she's suddenly thrust in a daisy chain of errors that lead her to face a larger system: growing up.
title: Anatomy of Assistance
plot_es: When 15 year-old Talia challenges the assistance envelope given to her by her school, she's suddenly thrust in a daisy chain of errors that lead her to face a larger system: growing up.
plot_en: When 15 year-old Talia challenges the assistance envelope given to her by her school, she's suddenly thrust in a daisy chain of errors that lead her to face a larger system: growing up.
